name: TroveFi
tagline: A no-loss prize savings protocol on Flow with AI-powered risk management
description: TroveFi lets users deposit USDC into a vault on Flow EVM testnet and participate in weekly lotteries funded by yield. A backend Python agent autonomously manages funds, executes draws using Flow VRF, and monitors deployed strategies with an ML anomaly detection model. The frontend is a Next.js dApp using Flow Client Library (FCL).
